summary: Completed testing duplicate-blocking removal from match card invite flow. Backend tests 100% successful, frontend partially tested with core functionality verified.

ui_bugs.issue: Authentication state inconsistency - sometimes shows 'Please sign in' even when user is logged in
ui_bugs.impact: Users may see confusing auth prompts but functionality works after refresh

passed_tests: Backend duplicate invitation test - POST /api/friends/invite/match allows multiple invites
Backend creates new invitation record and chat message each time
Frontend advanced modal opens and displays invite sections
All prediction CRUD operations work correctly
